situation.title: Halls of residence
situation.meta_description: The operation of accommodation at university dormitories is limited. Rules and recommendations on school housing.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

The operation of accommodation at university dormitories is limited. Students who have a different residence in the Czech Republic must return home.

The exemption is granted to:

  • students in the study programs of general medicine, dentistry, pharmacy, and other medical study programs that participate in clinical and practical teaching and practice, and students performing pedagogical practical teaching and practice in kindergartens, primary and secondary schools 
  • students who have been placed on on-call duty
  • students who have an employment relationship with the university (for example, doctoral students)

Students who live in their dormitory permanently and it is their place of residence do not have to leave. If you need to stay in college for this reason, please provide proof of your situation to your university.

If you are going to leave the dormitory and return home, please read more in the section Homecoming.

If you remain in the dormitory, we recommend limiting contact with other students. For these reasons, there are closed common areas, indoor sports grounds, and student clubs in student dormitories.

Canteens that are not open to the public are open from 06:00 until 20:00. Follow strict hygiene rules when eating. A maximum of 4 people can sit at one table and need to keep a distance of 1.5 meters.

Your university decides on the obligation to pay the dormitory fee. If your university does not reduce the dormitory fees and you find yourself in a difficult situation, you can apply for a social scholarship. You can also apply for financial support under the state social support system of the Ministry of Labor and Social Affairs, which can give you, for example, a one-time benefit of emergency immediate assistance. More information can be found on the web page of MPO.

questions_answers.question: Can I stay in the dorm?
questions_answers.value: Only if one of the exceptions applies to you
